kickstart.post: # The openmpi build seems to have a bug in its libtool processing; it # references $(INTSTALL)/lib in its lib/*.la files instead of $(INSTALL)/lib64. # This is a cheap/quick fix. /usr/bin/perl -pi -e 's#/opt/torque/lib\b#/opt/torque/lib64#g' \ /opt/openmpi/intel/mx/lib/*.la
